item.title: By the second quarter of 2015, there will be four new JW Marriott hotels opening in Asia
item.description: Source: Marriott. The JW Marriott Hotel Chongqing. Marriott International’s luxury brand, JW Marriott Hotels & Resorts, is expanding its presence in Asia with four new properties scheduled to open by the second quarter of 2015. These additions include three hotels in Greater China (Chongqing, Shenzhen Bao’an, and Macau) and one in India (Mumbai Sahar). This expansion will bring the brand’s footprint to 28 hotels and resorts in the Asia-Pacific region, including 11 in China and seven in India.
